item.description:
The girls at the second bate papo thought it might be fun to do a movie night.

I figured everyone's probably seen Central Station and Cidade de Deus, so I'm getting O Homem Que Copiava for us -- see IMDB for a description: http://www.imdb.com/t...

We'll be using the facilities in the Architecture school at MIT -- Rm. 7-431 (AVT), on the 4th floor of building 7.

If you're coming from Mass Ave, (bus #1) building 7 is the one with the stairs and columns right off Mass Ave. You just need to go to the 4th floor and then go left from the elevator past the stairs.

If you're coming from the Kendall T, you will want to walk through the campus to get to building 7. Here is a campus map showing building 7: http://whereis.mit.ed...
